text.#text:
There is established in the Treasury of the
			 United States a Renewable Energy Resource Conservation Fund to be administered
			 by the

The Secretary shall use amounts in the Fund to take actions
			 and to make payments to State agencies, Federal agencies, or other interested
			 persons in such regions for—

protecting and restoring important fish and
			 wildlife habitat in such regions, including corridors, water resources, and
			 other sensitive land; and

assuring and improving access to Federal
			 lands and waters in such regions for hunting, fishing, and other forms of
			 outdoor recreation in a manner consistent with the conservation of fish and
			 wildlife habitat.

Amounts in the Fund shall be available for expenditure,
			 in accordance with this subsection, without further appropriation and without
			 fiscal year limitation.
